attributes.action: lower car insurance premiums for young drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those who have just passed should technically be the best drivers as we know all the current rules of the roads. OAPs pay cheap insurance which is ridiculous! they are much worse. they drive up motorways the wrong way!! they struggle to see! so why are us young drivers being punished. its unfair.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
